Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard.team

Class DisplayTeam<P>

java.lang.Object
net.apartium.cocoabeans.scoreboard.team.DisplayTeam<P>
Type Parameters:
P - type of player
@AvailableSince("0.0.41") public abstract class DisplayTeam<P> extends Object
DisplayTeam is Packet-level NMS-driven team display that let you make custom Team easier with Observable fields
